img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character is running towards a glowing object surrounded by a red dashed circle. The environment is dark and forest-like, with vegetation visible on the ground. The character is holding a large weapon or tool, resembling a staff or hammer. The user interface displays health and stamina bars at the bottom left, and various icons at the bottom right, possibly indicating abilities or items. The glowing object appears to be a pot or container, highlighted as an important or interactive element in the game.
